languages.text: {n}Друкари убирает руку от струн и вытаскивает из ниши в основании тонкий сосуд, заполненный пульсирующим и переливающимся красным газом.{/n} "Без единого изъяна... Как можно удержаться..."

{n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари убирает руку от струн и вытаскивает из ниши в основании тонкий сосуд, заполненный пульсирующим и переливающимся красным газом.{/n} "Без единого изъяна... Как можно удержаться..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Drukhari removes his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}デュカーリは糸から手を離し、装置の底にある凹みに手を伸ばすと、脈打つようにきらめく赤いガスが入った細長い小瓶を取り出した。{/n}「欠点ひとつない…素晴らしい…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."

traits.locale_text: {n}デュカーリは糸から手を離し、装置の底にある凹みに手を伸ばすと、脈打つようにきらめく赤いガスが入った細長い小瓶を取り出した。{/n}「欠点ひとつない…素晴らしい…」
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}黑暗灵族将手从丝线上移开，伸向装置底部的凹槽，取出一个细长的小瓶。瓶子里装满了不断脉动、闪闪发光的红色气体。{/n}“没有一丝瑕疵……真是让人无法抗拒……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."

traits.locale_text: {n}黑暗灵族将手从丝线上移开，伸向装置底部的凹槽，取出一个细长的小瓶。瓶子里装满了不断脉动，闪闪发光的红色气体。{/n}“没有一丝瑕疵……真是让人无法抗拒……”
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}El Drukhari aparta la mano de las cuerdas, se acerca a un hueco en la base del aparato y saca un delgado frasco lleno de un gas rojo brillante y palpitante.{/n} «Ni una sola imperfección... Irresistible...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Drukhari retira la mano de las cuerdas, se acerca a un hueco en la base del aparato y saca un delgado frasco lleno de un gas rojo brillante y palpitante.{/n} «Ni una sola imperfección... Irresistible...».
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Der Drukhari nimmt seine Hand von den Fäden und holt aus einer Ausbuchtung am unteren Ende der Apparatur eine schmale Phiole mit einem pulsierenden, schimmernden roten Gas darin hervor.{/n} "Kein einziger Makel ... Unwiderstehlich ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Drukhari nimmt seine Hand von den Fäden und holt aus einer Ausbuchtung am unteren Ende der Apparatur eine schmale Phiole mit einem pulsierenden, schimmernden roten Gas darin hervor.{/n} "Kein einziger Makel ... Unwiderstehlich ..."
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Le Drukhari lève la main et extrait d'un renfoncement à la base de l'appareil une fine fiole remplie d'un gaz rouge scintillant.{/n} « Pas une seule imperfection... Irrésistible... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le Drukhari retire sa main et extrait d'un renfoncement à la base de l'appareil une fine fiole remplie d'un gaz rouge scintillant.{/n} « Pas une seule imperfection... Irrésistible... »
traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer

languages.text: {n}Drukhari, elini iplerden çekip cihazın tabanındaki bir girintiye uzanarak parıltılı, titreşen ve kırmızı renkli bir gazla dolu, ince bir şişe çıkarıyor.{/n} "Hiçbir kusuru yok... Dayanılır gibi değil..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Drukhari lifts his hand from the strings, reaches toward a recess in the base of the device, and takes out a slender vial filled with pulsing, shimmering red gas.{/n} "Not a single imperfection... Irresistible..."

traits.speaker: HeinrixTorturer
